text:
Hey Mo, I'm so so sorry to hear that. Please never feel pressure to message me back, I was mostly worried if you were okay or not, so I'm sorry to hear of your loss.
If you need time or anything I completely understand! Or if you need help with motivation, searching for something, asking me questions, anything, please say :slightly_smiling_face: I will aid you the best I can.

Let me have a look at that challenge, The new spider-verse film is amazing isn't it!
Have you checked out Nick Kondo's twitter? He frequently posts about behind the scenes work and other inspiring things!
Yeah I do! The movie was soo good loved it ! instantly preordered the dvd so I can watch it frame by frame :joy:
Inspired me to make that quick animation
I have a question, what steps did you take to find a job in the industry after Uni ? anything you recommend me do ?
